display_long_description:
# 40% OFF TO UPGRADE TO PREMIUM - USE CODE: **BFCM-9A23F2**

**Welcome to VRider SBK Connect** - the free version of the full game that lets you join multiplayer races as a guest!

Start your journey with the tutorial and Hot Lap Practice mode, where you can train on all official tracks with every bike unlocked. Then use a 6-digit invite code from a friend who owns the full game to join real multiplayer sessions and experience the rush of Superbike racing in immersive VR.

# What You Can Do in Connect:

🏍️ **Guest Multiplayer Access** – Join your friend’s race with a 6-digit code.

🎓 **Full Training Access** – Practice freely on every track with any motorbike.

🧠 **Tutorial Mode** – Learn every aspect of control, braking, and cornering.

🌍 **Global Connection** – Ride with players worldwide.

💬 **Find Invites** – Join our Discord and use the channel #play-together to find active race codes, enter the code in multiplayer, join the race and make new friends! discord.gg/S8VjVKzVqs

# Upgrade to the Full Game to unlock:

🏆 **All Single-Player and Multiplayer Modes** - including SBK Championship and Quick Race against 9 AI riders.

👥 **Host Multiplayer Races Anytime** – Set your own rules, invite friends, or use Quick Join without needing a code.

🌍 **Cross-Platform Competition** – Climb the leaderboards and race against players worldwide across all supported platforms to become the Official SBK Champion.

Experience the thrill of speed of the Official Superbike Championship, start with Connect, and **upgrade to go full throttle!**
